The '''Profile''' (or '''Traveler Profile''') is a player customizable display.

The player's Profile can be accessed from [[Paimon Menu]] > Edit Profile.

[[Friends]]' and Co-Op Players' Profiles can be accessed from the Friends Menu and [[Co-Op Mode]] Menu by selecting the Player's Avatar icon on the left of the list and clicking "Check Information."

==Features==
* [[UID]]: Unique Identifier of the player.
* Nickname:<ref group="Note" name="namesig">These features are disabled during specific times of the year, such as the period leading up to June 4, which is the anniversary of the {{w|1989 Tiananmen Square Protests}}, due to {{w|Censorship in China#Video games|Chinese censorship laws}}. In this case, the block ends on July 5. The nickname and signature in some servers can be modified up to 5 times each month.</ref> Customizable player name.
* [[Namecard]] Banner: Featured namecard that changes the appearance of a player's Paimon Menu and Friend List.
* [[Avatar]]: Unlocking [[character]]s, [[character outfit]]s, and completing certain [[Quest]]s allow them to be equipped as avatar icons.
* [[Adventure Rank]]
* [[World Level]]
* Signature:<ref group="Note" name="namesig" /> Short, descriptive message that is displayed on Paimon Menu.
* Total [[Achievement]]s
* Characters at maximum [[Friendship Level]]
* [[Spiral Abyss]] Progress including Floor, Chamber, and Abyssal Stars
* [[Imaginarium Theater]] Progress including Acts and Performance Medals
* Character Showcase: Showcase up to 12 unlocked characters. If character details are shown, they include [[Elemental Resonance]] bonus. Includes toggles to Show Character Details and Display [[Constellation]] Level.
* Namecards: Showcase up to 16 unlocked namecards.
